segments.text: Tom , it's time for you to take a shower .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , I don't want to bathe today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? You can't be always so lazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , I'm tired . I feel sleepy . I want to go to bed right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . But you promise this is the last time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I promise . Thank you , Mom .
segments.speaker: S2
